name: ZED Patrol
description:
ZED Patrol is a 3D top-down zombie shooter that puts you in the middle of a post-apocalyptic world overrun by the undead. Your mission: to take out the four bosses and retrieve the keycards to save the city. But with hordes of zombies around every corner, it won't be easy.

The best part? You don't have to face the undead alone. Our game is multiplayer, so you can squad up with your friends and fight off the zombie hordes together! You and your friends are dropped into a procedurally-generated city, with a variety of weapons for you to find. Work as a team to navigate the city, strategize, coordinate, and watch each other's backs!

With immersive gameplay and sound design in a stylized 3D world, our game will have you on the edge of your seat from start to finish. So what are you waiting for, soldier? Join your squad, grab some weapons, and let's take down some zombies!
